thread.title: Panama Canal Authority CEO announced as keynote speaker
thread.title_full: Panama Canal Authority CEO announced as keynote speaker

author: eTN Managing Editor
title: Panama Canal Authority CEO announced as keynote speaker
text:
Panama Canal Authority CEO announced as keynote speaker Adv: 
Jul 22, 2015 Adv: 
Every year, the ACI-LAC & World Annual Conference and Exhibition brings all sectors of the airport industry together to provide airport executives and their peers from across the world and the LAC region with insights into the latest trends and strategies. So please join us on 31 August to 2 September in Panama City, Panama for this dynamic conference. 
We are pleased to announce Mr. Jorge L. Quijano, CEO, Panama Canal Authority, will be a keynote speaker at the 25th ACI Latin America-Caribbean World Annual General Assembly, Conference & Exhibition 2015. 
Mr. Quijano will speak about the Panama Canal Expansion project, one of the most important infrastructure transport endeavors in the world, that will not only transform the country´s economy, but will impact maritime connectivity, and provide insights to the air transport community. 
The conference is set to feature many top industry speakers including: 
Kjeld Binger, Chief Executive Officer, Airport International Group Declan Collier, Chief Executive Officer, London City Airport Martin Eurnekian, Chief Executive Officer, Corporacion América Joseph Fidanque III, General Manager, Tocumen International Airport, S.A. Alexis Long, Head Security Policy, Heathrow Airport Bongani Maseko, Chief Executive Officer, Airports Company South Africa Catherine Mayer, Vice President, SITA Joseph Napoli, Chief of Staff and Policy Advisor, Miami-Dade Aviation Department Hector Navarrete, Director of Regional Airports, ASUR and President of ACI-LAC Fredrick Piccolo, President and Chief Executive Officer, Sarasota Manatee Airport Authority and Chair, ACI World Jeroen ven Vliet, Senior Vice President, KLM Security Services, KLM Royal Dutch Airlines
